biography:
Pablo Espinosa was born on September 9, 1969 in Los Angeles, California, USA as Pablo Alberto Espinosa. He is known for his work on Hollow Man (2000), The General's Daughter (1999) and The Fallen Ones (2005).

Attended Military Schools for 8 years (5th - 8th: Southern Cal. Military Academy; 9th- 12th: Riverside Military Academy). Graduated highest ranking Cadet (Lt. Col., Battallion Commander). Born to Cuban Parents that emmigrated to the USA in 1959, during the Communist Revolution. Youngest of three boys. He is in a couple of films with his friend actor Casper Van Dien.
name: Pablo Espinosa
